summary: A test suite that quickly validates the functionality and performance optimizations of the ControlNet image‑to‑image generation pipeline, covering component setup, attention slicing behavior, batch versus single inference consistency, IP‑adapter integration, and XFormers‑based attention execution.
business_intent: Provide rapid assurance that the ControlNet img2img pipeline operates correctly and efficiently for AI image generation services, enabling safe deployment of performance enhancements and new adapters.
